members.description: Create a new RemoteObject.  in the services-config.xml file.

values: destination The destination of the RemoteObject, should match a destination name

members.description: Returns an Operation of the given name. If the Operation wasn't created beforehand, a new mx.rpc.remoting.mxml.Operation is created during this call. Operations are usually accessible by simply naming them after the service variable (myService.someOperation), but if your Operation name happens to match a defined method on the service (like setCredentials), you can use this method to get the Operation instead.

values: Operation that executes for this name.

members.description: Called automatically by the MXML compiler if the RemoteObject is set up using a tag.  If you create the RemoteObject through ActionScript you may want to call this method yourself as it is useful for validating any arguments.

values: document the MXML document on which this RemoteObject lives
id the id of this RemoteObject within the document
